message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product for $9,500. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Could you consider meeting me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $8,500 is a tempting offer, the true value of this product is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down to $9,000.  This is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $8,500 and $9,000. How about $8,750?
